execution_plan.description: Retrieve each product's id and price from the products database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price IS NOT NULL;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve order items (order_id and product_id) for products found in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT order_id, product_id FROM Order_Items WHERE product_id IN ($step1.product_id);
